Uses of Interface
htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.Folder

  • Packages that use Folder 
    Package Description
    htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual  

    • Uses of Folder in htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

      Classes in htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual that implement Folder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalFolder
      A LocalFolder represents a Folder of the local filesystem, which is a node of our filesystem.
      class  MountPointFolder
      The MountPointFolder contains all distributed sub filesystems which should be unified in one filesystem.
      class  RemoteFolder
      A RemoteFolder represents a Folder located on a remote filesystem.
